author: samisa
msg: Axis Java's SimpleAxisServer does not handle HTTP/1.1 properly. Hence get a broken pipe. Changed the protocol to HTTP/1.0. If Axis Java is used with Tomcat, then HTTP/1.1 works fine.

author: samisa
msg: Fixed problems due to header file locaion changes and .hpp header extention. Also changed the readme to build without make.

author: gawor
msg: changed slightly the order of how serializers are discovered. the class lookup for serializer is now done after the type mapping lookup and before class interface lookup. before this change the class lookup was done only at the very end as a last resort if no serializer was found. that led to problems where sometimes a subclass serializer was used to serialize the object even though a specific serializer was associated with the class (in metadata)

author: dims
msg: Sometimes you need to set the JIKESPATH before running ant to get things working.

author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS-1689 - Broken NTLM support in CommonsHTTPSender
